page.title: 11Ellerton on Swale
page.content: {Ellerton on Swale}is made up of the hamlets of{North Ellerton}and{South {Ellerton.}The original farm workers' cottages are now no longer occupied by agricultural workers,but by a few ordinary families,as fewer people now work on the land. The nearest shops and centre for community activities is{Scorton,}a village two miles to the north.The nearest bus service passes through Scorton.Because of the lack of a bus service families have to rely on their own cars. The local primary school is Bolton on Swale C.E.School. {Ellerton Park}has a privately owned lake of 60 acres stocked for coarse fishing with bream,roach,carp,chub, barbel,pike and eels.Fishermen can use the lake on a daily or seasonal basis.
